item.title: Sunday Coffee Break
item.dc:creator: ellen
item.excerpt:encoded: You can include a caption text to your image by filling out the image description text in the admin panel.

item.title: Pizza Logo
item.dc:creator: feinifuh
item.excerpt:encoded: You have to try the New York Style pizza at Sal's on K'Road in Auckland.

item.title: Waipoua Theme on Mobile Devices
item.dc:creator: feinifuh
item.excerpt:encoded: You can see more pictures of the < href="http://www.flickr.com/photos/elmastudio/sets/72157629979249078/">Waipoua theme on mobile devices on Flickr.

item.title: A Chat Protocol
item.dc:creator: ellen
item.content:encoded:
• Ellen: This is a chat protocoll
  • Manuel: Wow, this is great. I didn't know I could include something like that into a post!
  • Ellen: Yes, you can but you need to create a ul list with the class of "chat".
  • Manuel: What else do I need to do?
  • Ellen: Then you can create your chat protocoll by adding li elements with the classes "odd" and "even" in return.
  • Manuel: Hey, thanks a lot for your help. I will definitely try that!

item.title: Testing the Threaded Comments
item.dc:creator: ellen
item.content:encoded:
Tiramisu powder toffee I love. Faworki wypas biscuit chocolate bar topping cupcake I love I love jelly. Cookie cupcake muffin I love wafer I love donut. Macaroon oat cake cake halvah carrot cake brownie. Oat cake toffee gummies caramels topping. Ice cream icing chocolate biscuit I love I love sesame snaps. Tart chocolate bar carrot cake candy bear claw. Jelly beans sugar plum jujubes souffl candy canes. Caramels tiramisu apple pie wafer pie I love. Jelly beans drage lemon drops marshmallow sweet roll. Muffin liquorice tootsie roll jujubes oat cake muffin gingerbread chocolate gummies. Ice cream chupa chups jelly sesame snaps candy tiramisu. Marzipan tart powder I love I love macaroon. <!--more-->
Biscuit faworki brownie sugar plum brownie. Pastry sweet ice cream lemon drops marzipan. Candy canes candy canes pie souffl brownie icing. Powder bonbon pie cake sugar plum gummies lollipop gummies jelly beans. Carrot cake tiramisu cake pastry cookie chocolate bar icing marzipan candy canes. Carrot cake I love brownie drage carrot cake muffin drage tart. Dessert croissant cheesecake cake. I love I love brownie icing I love brownie chupa chups. Cotton candy jujubes I love tiramisu. Topping icing croissant. Chocolate cake sugar plum cotton candy cupcake liquorice. I love fruitcake I love tootsie roll I love. Gummi bears lemon drops donut tiramisu drage. Marzipan marshmallow gummies.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hey, did you konw you can reply to a comment, too?

I can also use a quote in a comment using the blockquote tag:
Quis scelerisque tincidunt pellentesque aliquet velit, arcu risus porta etiam in odio ac ut nec porta, est lorem mus?
This way you can style your comment and make it look a lot nicer :)
One more comment reply to this quote...
Just testing the comment area of the Waipoua WordPress theme :)

item.title: Just a little Aside note
item.dc:creator: ellen
item.content:encoded: This is the aside post format. You can use this <ins>post format to publish some notes or shorter texts</ins> to your blog. Gummies bear claw lemon drops caramels fruitcake. Halvah chocolate bar marzipan sugar plum tootsie roll. Tootsie roll candy canes tootsie roll. Gingerbread topping liquorice lollipop gummies dessert chocolate bar caramels chocolate cake. Apple pie biscuit chocolate bar powder lemon drops cotton candy brownie bear claw croissant. Gingerbread tiramisu powder brownie applicake marzipan ice cream tootsie roll lollipop. Dessert donut topping. Chocolate marzipan fruitcake chupa chups muffin gingerbread toffee marzipan souffl. Lemon drops topping carrot cake pie candy canes lollipop sugar plum lemon drops.

item.title: Blog Archive
item.dc:creator: ellen
item.content:encoded:
[smart_archives] [divider]

How to create the Archive page

To include a archive of of all your blog posts you can use the "Smart Archives Reloaded" WordPress plugin. After the theme installation just include the shortcode [smart_archives] into a new page. In the plugin settings (see Settings/Smart Archives in the Admin panel) you can choose "both" as the Format, so the block and list archive elements both will be displayed.

item.title: Contact Us
item.dc:creator: ellen
item.content:encoded:
To use forms you can install the Contact Form 7 WordPress plugin. After installation of the plugin just create a new form via the Contact Form 7 settings page and copy/paste the shortcode into a page or post.

Please leave a message

[contact-form-7 id="100" title="Contact Form"]

item.title: The Text Elements
item.dc:creator: ellen
item.content:encoded:
Have a look at all the font styles like headlines, blockquotes, list elements or tables. You can also use the extra CSS class intro to include an intro text in a bigger font size to your posts.

Croissant candy lemon drops. Caramels chocolate cake tart apple pie caramels gummi bears jelly-o. Jelly-o cake sweet roll macaroon ice cream caramels tootsie roll. Donut bear claw cake sweet roll wafer caramels. Chupa chups liquorice lemon drops biscuit cake tart danish applicake. Pie chocolate marzipan gummi bears bonbon brownie. Powder topping gummies pie chocolate marzipan lollipop brownie.

Center Align Text

Aenean a turpis eu augue luctus vulputate. Ut nonummy arcu in est. Nulla facilisi. Fusce at est sollicitudin pede gravida luctus. Sed ut dolor non nulla luctus aliquam. Phasellus sodales dapibus turpis. Nulla malesuada. In sed quam. Donec sollicitudin convallis nisl. Donec nunc. Suspendisse malesuada libero in nisi. Etiam vitae metus non arcu gravida tincidunt. Duis accumsan purus et orci. Curabitur volutpat. Nulla quis purus id enim dapibus malesuada. Nam egestas luctus arcu. Praesent iaculis massa.

Right Align Text

Aenean tempor, risus nec eleifend tristique, sem orci aliquam urna, eget iaculis tortor mauris ut lorem. Aenean eu tellus. Sed at mauris at nisl ultricies lobortis. Vivamus lacinia, lorem vel congue facilisis, leo leo sodales leo, vitae euismod velit ante a ligula. Vivamus sit amet turpis ut eros molestie porttitor. Nam erat lacus, auctor vel, dictum a, suscipit sed, orci. Quisque est lorem, facilisis consequat, sagittis a, ullamcorper at, ante. Nullam ultricies gravida dui. Nunc mauris. Quisque neque. Quisque eu sem.

Justified Text

Vivamus volutpat, arcu sed venenatis consequat, nulla pede blandit neque, quis ultrices ligula mauris ut leo. Proin iaculis. Pellentesque vulputate magna at lectus. Etiam semper aliquet lectus. Nullam turpis. Vivamus sed lacus. Integer metus arcu, adipiscing sed, vehicula et, vulputate sit amet, massa. Sed lobortis tempus lectus. In lacus. Duis nibh. Donec molestie libero ut neque. In sollicitudin aliquam felis. Sed molestie libero ac mi. Curabitur magna nunc, feugiat sed, sodales vitae, pretium a, leo. Sed ut ante. Integer turpis ante, facilisis sed, dignissim vitae, consectetuer sed, dui. Sed ultricies.

Headerline one

Headerline two

Headerline three

Headerline four

Headerline five
Headerline six

Blockquotes

Blockquote:
Here's a one line quote.
This part isn't quoted. Here's a longer quote:
Its like a language. You learn the alphabet, which are the scales. You learn sentences, which are the chords. And then you talk extemporaneously with the horn. Its a wonderful thing to speak extemporaneously, which is something Ive never gotten the hang of. But musically I love to talk just off the top of my head. And thats what jazz music is all about. Stan Getz
And some trailing text.

Table Layout Test

Title Views
About Test User 1 More
260 1 More
Archives 1 More
235 1 More

Definition List

Definition List Title
This is a definition list division.
Definition
An exact statement or description of the nature, scope, or meaning of something: our definition of what constitutes poetry.
Gallery
A feature introduced with WordPress 2.5, that is specifically an exposition of images attached to a post. In that same vein, an upload is "attached to a post" when you upload it while editing a post.
Gravatar
A globally recognized avatar (a graphic image or picture that represents a user). A gravatar is associated with an email address, and is maintained by the Gravatar.com service. Using this service, a blog owner can configure their blog so that a user's gravatar is displayed along with their comments.

Unordered List (Nested)

  • List item one
    • List item one
      • List item one
      • List item two
      • List item three
      • List item four
    • List item two
    • List item three
    • List item four
  • List item two
  • List item three
  • List item four

Ordered List

  1. List item one
    1. List item one
      1. List item one
      2. List item two
      3. List item three
      4. List item four
    2. List item two
    3. List item three
    4. List item four
  2. List item two
  3. List item three
  4. List item four
It was popularised in the 1960s with the release of Letraset sheets containing Lorem Ipsum passages, and more recently with desktop publishing software like Aldus PageMaker including versions of Lorem Ipsum.

HTML Element Tag Tests

All other HTML tags listed in the FAQ: Here is the address for Automattic, using the <address> tag:
355 1st Street Suite 202 San Francisco, CA 94105 United States
This is an example of an <anchor> (otherwise known as a link). This abbr. is an example of an <abbr> tag in the middle of a sentence. Here is a TLA showing off the <acronym> tag. What, you want to see some over-sized text using the <big> tag? Can you cite a reference for that, using the <cite> tag? Have you noticed that all of the tag names are displayed in code-form, using the <code> tag? Similarly, I could emulate keyboard text, using the <kbd> text tag, or emulate teletype text using the <tt> tag. Oh no! I wrote something incorrectly. I'd better delete it, using the <del> tag. I could alternately strike something out using the <strike> tag, or strike something out using the <s> tag. So many choices, which I emphasize using the <em> tag. Just to clarify, this is some inserted text, that I'll highlight using the <ins> tag. Need to display completely unformatted text, such as a large block of code? Use the <pre> tag, which lets you display: 
#container {
	float: left;
	margin: 0 -240px 0 0;
	width: 100%;
}
Want to quote the WordPress tagline Code is Poetry? Use the <q> tag to add quotes around it. This is strong text (otherwise known as bold), using the <strong> tag. Need to write H2O or E = MC2? You may find great use for subscripting text using the <sub> tag, or for superscripting text using the <sup> tag. Need to call out a variable? Use the <var> tag.

Div and Span Tests

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit.
This is a div with "myclass" class, inside of another div, using the <div> tag.
Sed odio nibh, tincidunt adipiscing, pretium nec, tincidunt id, enim. Fusce scelerisque nunc vitae nisl.
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit. This is a span inside of a paragraph, using the <span> tag. Sed odio nibh, tincidunt adipiscing, pretium nec, tincidunt id, enim. Fusce scelerisque nunc vitae nisl.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hello, this is just a comment to test the comment area...

item.title: Quote by Jawaharlal Nehru
item.dc:creator: ellen
item.content:encoded: We live in a wonderful world that is full of beauty, charm and adventure. There is no end to the adventures we can have if only we seek them with our eyes open. Jawaharlal Nehru

item.title: This is a Status Post
item.dc:creator: ellen
item.content:encoded: I always love to dream of big adventures and sometimes I don't realize that I'm already right in the middle of one...

item.title: Dancing on the edge of finished
item.dc:creator: ellen
item.content:encoded: The challenge is to level set, to be comfortable with the undone, with the cycle of never-ending. We were trained to finish our homework, our peas and our chores. Today, we're never finished, and that's okay. It's a dance, not an endless grind. from Dancing on the edge of finished by Seth Godin

item.title: Waipoua: Premium responsive WordPress Theme by Elmastudio
item.dc:creator: ellen
item.content:encoded: Waipoua is a Premium mobile-first, responsive WordPress Theme for Blogs. The theme is easy to use and has lots of cool features, like WordPress post format support, a featured post column or a two column standard version, lots of sidebar widgets and shortcodes. The theme works as beautifully on mobile devices like smartphones and tablets as it does on big desktop screens. The theme setup doesn't only take a few minutes, you can use the practical options in the theme options page, select a custom background and include widgets in the sidebar and an optional header widget area. Have a look around the Waipoua live demo or ask questions and buy the theme directly on the Waipoua theme page.
